fields.name: Acrobatic

fields.name: Additional Traits
fields.description: Gain two additional character traits

fields.description: +2 bonus on Perception and Sense Motive checks

fields.description: Channel energy can heal or harm outsiders

fields.description: +2 bonus on Handle Animal and Ride checks

fields.name: Arcane Armor Training
fields.description: Reduce your arcane spell failure chance by 10%

fields.name: Arcane Armor Mastery
fields.description: Reduce your arcane spell failure chance by 20%

fields.name: Arcane Blast
fields.description: Sacrifice a spell to make ray attack

fields.name: Arcane Shield
fields.description: Sacrifice a spell to gain deflection bonus to AC

fields.name: Arcane Strike
fields.description: +1 damage and weapons are considered magic

fields.name: Arcane Talent
fields.description: Cast a 0-level spell 3 times per day as a spell-like ability

fields.name: Armor Proficiency, Light
fields.description: No penalties on attack rolls while wearing light armor

fields.name: Armor Proficiency, Medium
fields.description: No penalties on attack rolls while wearing medium armor

fields.name: Armor Proficiency, Heavy
fields.description: No penalties on attack rolls while wearing heavy armor

fields.description: Gain one of four bestial advantages

fields.description: +2 bonus on Climb and Swim checks

fields.name: Augment Summoning
fields.description: Summoned creatures gain +4 Str and Con

fields.description: Reroll miss chances for concealment

fields.name: Improved Blind-Fight
fields.description: Ignore miss chance for less than total concealment

fields.name: Greater Blind-Fight
fields.description: Total concealment is considered normal concealment

fields.name: Breadth of Experience
fields.description: +2 bonus on all Knowledge and Profession checks

fields.name: Catch Off-Guard
fields.description: No penalties for improvised melee weapons

fields.name: Channel Smite

fields.name: Childlike
fields.description: +2 on Disguise checks to look like human child, take 10 on Bluff checks

fields.name: Combat Casting
fields.description: +4 bonus on concentration checks for defensive casting

fields.name: Combat Expertise
fields.description: Trade attack bonus for AC bonus

fields.description: Aid another as a move action with two adjacent allies

fields.description: +2 bonus on dirty trick attempts, no attack of opportunity

fields.description: Dirty trick penalty lasts 1d4 rounds

fields.description: +2 bonus on disarm attempts, no attack of opportunity

fields.description: Enemies you feint lose their Dex bonus for 1 round

fields.description: +2 bonus on reposition attempts, no attack of opportunity

fields.description: Enemies you reposition provoke attacks of opportunity

fields.description: +2 bonus on steal attempts, no attack of opportunity

fields.description: Enemies don’t notice theft until after combat

fields.description: +2 bonus on trip attempts, no attack of opportunity

fields.description: Enemies you trip provoke attacks of opportunity

fields.description: Attempt a reposition attack on a successful critical hit

fields.description: Exchange later attacks to reroll missed first attack

fields.description: Take a –5 penalty on later attacks to reroll missed attack

fields.name: Swift Aid
fields.description: Attempt to aid another as a swift action

fields.description: Make additional attacks of opportunity

fields.description: Use attack of opportunity to add a bonus to adjacent ally’s AC

fields.name: In Harm’s Way
fields.description: Take the damage of a successful attack upon an adjacent ally

fields.name: Combat Patrol
fields.description: Increase threatened area for attack of opportunity

fields.name: Stand Still
fields.description: Stop enemies from moving past you

fields.description: Teleporting creatures provoke attacks of opportunity

fields.description: Channel energy can be used to control undead

fields.description: +2 bonus on Craft or Spellcraft checks while working together

fields.description: Read and speak two additional languages

fields.name: Blinding Critical
fields.description: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is blinded

fields.description: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target’s speed is halved

fields.description: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is sickened

fields.name: Staggering Critical
fields.description: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is staggered

fields.description: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is fatigued

fields.name: Exhausting Critical
fields.description: Whenever you score a critical hit, the target is exhausted

fields.description: Deliver coup de grace to cowering or stunned target

fields.description: Trade ranged attack bonus for damage

fields.description: +2 bonus on Bluff and Disguise checks

fields.description: Gain 2 temporary ki from drunken ki

fields.description: Your darkvision has a range of 120 feet

fields.description: +4 AC against attacks of opportunity from movement

fields.description: Sidestep without using your 5-foot step on your next turn

fields.description: +4 on Acrobatics checks to move past larger opponents

fields.description: Gain 50% concealment if you move

fields.description: +1 bonus on save DCs for one energy type

fields.description: +1 bonus on save DCs for one energy type

fields.description: +4 bonus on checks to avoid nonlethal damage

fields.description: Demoralize opponent as free action when you inflict nonlethal damage

fields.description: No penalty on attacks made with one exotic weapon

fields.description: Channel energy two additional times per day

fields.description: +2 bonus on Spellcraft and Use Magic Device checks

fields.description: +2 on Craft (alchemy) checks, and you can create alchemical items and poisons faster

fields.description: Double spell area

fields.name: Allied Spellcaster
fields.description: +2 bonus on level checks to overcome spell resistance

fields.name: Coordinated Defense
fields.description: +2 bonus to CMD

fields.name: Coordinated Maneuvers
fields.description: +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks

fields.name: Duck and Cover
fields.description: Take ally’s result on Reflex saving throw

fields.name: Lookout
fields.description: Act in surprise round if ally can act

fields.name: Outflank
fields.description: Gain +4 bonus on attack rolls when flanking

fields.name: Paired Opportunists
fields.description: +4 bonus on attacks of opportunity

fields.name: Precise Strike
fields.description: Deal +1d6 points of precision damage with melee attacks

fields.name: Shield Wall
fields.description: Increase your shield bonus to AC

fields.name: Shielded Caster
fields.description: +4 bonus on concentration checks

fields.name: Swap Places
fields.description: Switch places with an adjacent ally
